  • 5.12 IOT

5.12 IOTÔÉÅ

It describes an IoT device.

Type: IOT (Record)

ID

Name

Type

#

Description

1

description

str

1

Identifier of the IoT function.

2

name

str

1

Name of the IoT service provider.

3

type

str

1

Type of the IoT device.

Sample IOT object represented in JSON Format:

{
  "description": "IoT",
  "name": "Azure IoT",
  "type": "sensor"
}
